1: עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> תִּתְגֹּדְדִ֣י <sup>1413 </sup> <n>Now gather</n> בַת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>O daughter</n> גְּד֔וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>thyself in troops</n> מָצ֖וֹר <sup>4692 </sup> <n>siege</n> שָׂ֣ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>he hath laid</n> עָלֵ֑ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> בַּשֵּׁ֙בֶט֙ <sup>7626 </sup> <n>with a rod</n> יַכּ֣וּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>against us they shall smite</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> הַלְּחִ֔י <sup>3895 </sup> <n>upon the cheek</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> שֹׁפֵ֥ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>the judge</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> ס
2: וְאַתָּ֞ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <sup>1035 </sup> <n>But thou Bethlehem</n> אֶפְרָ֗תָה <sup>672 </sup> <n>Ephratah</n> צָעִיר֙ <sup>6810 </sup> <n>[though] thou be little</n> לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>to be among</n> בְּאַלְפֵ֣י <sup>505 </sup> <n>among the thousands</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> מִמְּךָ֙ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> לִ֣י יֵצֵ֔א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>[yet] out of thee shall he come forth</n> לִֽהְי֥וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>unto me [that is] to be ruler</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> וּמוֹצָאֹתָ֥יו <sup>4163 </sup> <n>whose goings forth</n> מִקֶּ֖דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>[have been] from of old</n> מִימֵ֥י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the days</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of eternity</n>
3: לָכֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> יִתְּנֵ֔ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Therefore will he give them up</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>them until</n> עֵ֥ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>until the time</n> יוֹלֵדָ֖ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[that] she which travaileth</n> יָלָ֑דָה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>hath brought forth</n> וְיֶ֣תֶר <sup>3499 </sup> <n>then the remnant</n> אֶחָ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>of his brethren</n> יְשׁוּב֖וּן <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
4: וְעָמַ֗ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>And he shall stand</n> וְרָעָה֙ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>and feed</n> בְּעֹ֣ז <sup>5797 </sup> <n>in the strength</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> בִּגְא֕וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>in the majesty</n> שֵׁ֖ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>of the name</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהָ֑יו <sup>430 </sup> <n>his God</n> וְיָשָׁ֕בוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and they shall abide</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> עַתָּ֥ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>time</n> יִגְדַּ֖ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>for now shall he be great</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אַפְסֵי־ <sup>657 </sup> <n>unto the ends</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
5: וְהָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> זֶ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> שָׁל֑וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>And this [man] shall be the peace</n> אַשּׁ֣וּר ׀ <sup>804 </sup> <n>when the Assyrian</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> בְאַרְצֵ֗נוּ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into our land</n> וְכִ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יִדְרֹךְ֙ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>and when he shall tread</n> בְּאַרְמְנֹתֵ֔ינוּ <sup>759 </sup> <n>in our palaces</n> וַהֲקֵמֹ֤נוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>then shall we raise</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> שִׁבְעָ֣ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>against him seven</n> רֹעִ֔ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>shepherds</n> וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <sup>8083 </sup> <n>and eight</n> נְסִיכֵ֥י <sup>5257 </sup> <n>principal</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n>
6: וְרָע֞וּ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>afflict</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֤רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> אַשּׁוּר֙ <sup>804 </sup> <n>of Assyria</n> בַּחֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> נִמְרֹ֖ד <sup>5248 </sup> <n>of Nimrod</n> בִּפְתָחֶ֑יהָ <sup>6607 </sup> <n>in the entrances</n> וְהִצִּיל֙ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>thereof thus shall he deliver</n> מֵֽאַשּׁ֔וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>[us] from the Assyrian</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>when he cometh</n> בְאַרְצֵ֔נוּ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into our land</n> וְכִ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and when</n> יִדְרֹ֖ךְ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>and when he treadeth</n> בִּגְבוּלֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>within our borders</n> ס
7: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Then</n> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>And the remnant</n> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>shall be in the midst</n> עַמִּ֣ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> רַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of many</n> כְּטַל֙ <sup>2919 </sup> <n>as a dew</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from the LORD</n> כִּרְבִיבִ֖ים <sup>7241 </sup> <n>as the showers</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> עֵ֑שֶׂב <sup>6212 </sup> <n>upon the grass</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יְקַוֶּה֙ <sup>6960 </sup> <n>that tarrieth</n> לְאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>not for man</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Or</n> יְיַחֵ֖ל <sup>3176 </sup> <n>nor waiteth</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for the sons</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n>
8: וְהָיָה֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>And the remnant</n> יַעֲקֹ֜ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>shall be among the Gentiles</n> בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> עַמִּ֣ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> רַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of many</n> כְּאַרְיֵה֙ <sup>738 </sup> <n>as a lion</n> בְּבַהֲמ֣וֹת <sup>929 </sup> <n>among the beasts</n> יַ֔עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>of the forest</n> כִּכְפִ֖יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>as a young lion</n> בְּעֶדְרֵי־ <sup>5739 </sup> <n>among the flocks</n> צֹ֑אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of sheep</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> אִם <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> עָבַ֛ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>who if he go through</n> וְרָמַ֥ס <sup>7429 </sup> <n>both treadeth down</n> וְטָרַ֖ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>and teareth in pieces</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> מַצִּֽיל׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>and none can deliver</n>
9: תָּרֹ֥ם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>shall be lifted up</n> יָדְךָ֖ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>Thine hand</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> צָרֶ֑יךָ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>upon thine adversaries</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>and all thine enemies</n> יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>shall be cut off</n> פ
10: וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַיּוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>that I will cut off</n> סוּסֶ֖יךָ <sup>5483 </sup> <n>thy horses</n> מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>out of the midst</n> וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖י <sup>6 </sup> <n>of thee and I will destroy</n> מַרְכְּבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>4818 </sup> <n>thy chariots</n>
11: וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>And I will cut off</n> עָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the cities</n> אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of thy land</n> וְהָרַסְתִּ֖י <sup>2040 </sup> <n>and throw down</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִבְצָרֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>4013 </sup> <n>all thy strong holds</n>
12: וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>And I will cut off</n> כְשָׁפִ֖ים <sup>3785 </sup> <n>witchcrafts</n> מִיָּדֶ֑ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of thine hand</n> וּֽמְעוֹנְנִ֖ים <sup>6049 </sup> <n>and thou shalt have no [more] soothsayers</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יִֽהְיוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will have</n> לָֽךְ׃
13: וְהִכְרַתִּ֧י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>also will I cut off</n> פְסִילֶ֛יךָ <sup>6456 </sup> <n>Thy graven images</n> וּמַצֵּבוֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>4676 </sup> <n>and thy standing images</n> מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>out of the midst</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>you will no</n> תִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <sup>7812 </sup> <n>of thee and thou shalt no more worship</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> לְמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>the work</n> יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hands</n>
14: וְנָתַשְׁתִּ֥י <sup>5428 </sup> <n>And I will pluck up</n> אֲשֵׁירֶ֖יךָ <sup>842 </sup> <n>thy groves</n> מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>out of the midst</n> וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֖י <sup>8045 </sup> <n>of thee so will I destroy</n> עָרֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>your cities</n>
15: וְעָשִׂ֜יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And I will execute</n> בְּאַ֧ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>in anger</n> וּבְחֵמָ֛ה <sup>2534 </sup> <n>and fury</n> נָקָ֖ם <sup>5359 </sup> <n>vengeance</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>upon the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>such as they have not heard</n> ס
